title: W3C Technical Architecture Group-relevant MDN issues
description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by W3C Technical Architecture Group

items.content_html:
MDN URL

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/@property

What specific section or headline is this issue about?

The availability box at the top

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

It says it is not out in Firefox yet, but it just came out in FF 128! ðŸŽ‰ðŸ¥³ðŸš€ðŸŽ†

What did you expect to see?

Newly available in all browsers.

Do you have any supporting links, references, or citations?

The compatibility at the bottom of the page says so hehe:

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/@property#browser_compatibility

Do you have anything more you want to share?

Maybe the availability box is behind in getting updated? Is it automatic?
